Our Methodology

Six algorithms work in parallel, each designed for different market conditions and investor styles. Every pick is timestamped and hashed for transparency.

Alpha Predator

Most Active Today

Scientific composite combining Trend (ADX), Momentum (Awesome Oscillator), and Structure (VCP pattern) for robust signals.

Hold Time: 3-7 days
Best For: Any stock with strong trend alignment
Key Indicators: ADX, AO, VCP, VWAP

Technical Momentum

Multi-Timeframe

Captures short-term momentum using volume surges, RSI extremes, breakouts, and Bollinger Band squeezes.

Hold Time: 24h / 3d / 7d
Best For: Short-term momentum plays
Key Indicators: RSI, Volume Z, Bollinger, ATR

CAN SLIM

Growth Stocks

Based on William O'Neil's proven methodology. Focuses on relative strength, Stage-2 uptrends, and institutional accumulation.

Hold Time: 3-12 months
Best For: Growth stocks, $10+
Key Indicators: RS Rating, Stage-2, VCP

Composite Rating

Balanced

Multi-factor approach combining technical, volume, and fundamental data with market regime awareness.

Hold Time: 1-3 months
Best For: General watchlist, any stock
Key Indicators: SMA, RSI, Volume, PE, YTD

Penny Sniper

Dormant

High-risk microcap hunter for stocks $0.50-$15. Requires volume spikes and golden cross patterns.

Hold Time: 24 hours
Status: Needs more penny stocks in universe

Value Sleeper

Dormant

Mean reversion strategy for undervalued companies near 52-week lows with solid fundamentals.

Hold Time: 3+ months
Status: Requires specific market conditions

How We Validate Results

1

Timestamp & Hash

Every pick is timestamped and given a SHA-256 hash before markets open. This creates an immutable record that cannot be altered.

2

Slippage Simulation

We add +0.5% to entry prices to account for real-world execution costs. This makes our reported returns more realistic.

3

Automated Verification

GitHub Actions run every 6 hours to check if any picks have completed their holding period, then fetch current prices.

4

Transparent Results

All results are published to our GitHub repo and this page. Wins and losses are both displayed honestly.

Which Picks Are Right for You?

Small Budget ($500-$5,000)

  • Focus on STRONG BUY, Medium Risk picks
  • Hold 3-5 positions maximum
  • Stick to 1-month timeframes
  • Avoid penny stocks
  • Keep 20% in cash
Today's Best Fit: SBUX, PFE

Medium Budget ($5,000-$50,000)

  • Diversify across 6-10 positions
  • Mix of timeframes OK
  • Can include some swing trades
  • Limit any single position to 15%
  • Keep 15% in cash
Today's Best Fit: GM, VTRS, WMT, CAT

Large Budget ($50,000+)

  • Hold 12-20 positions
  • Sector diversification required
  • Can allocate small % to high-risk
  • Position sizes 5-7% max
  • Keep 10% in cash
Today's Best Fit: Full portfolio from today's picks
